data.question: Which of the following is the correct definition of Computer?
data.a: Computer is a machine or device that can be programmed to perform arithmetical or logic operation sequences automatically
data.b: Computer understands only binary language which is written in the form of 0s & 1s
data.c: Computer is a programmable electronic device that stores, retrieves, and processes the data
